With Mitsuki's [[Chakra Transfer Technique|addition]] of senjutsu chakra and Sarada adding to the force of impact, Boruto's Compression Rasengan's compression and power is increased. Their combined might makes it possible to overcome the near impervious defences, like [[Deepa]]'s [[Carbon Armour]].

== Trivia ==
* In ''[[Naruto x Boruto: Ninja Voltage]]'', Boruto can perform this without the assistance of Sarada and Mitsuki, relying on the [[Kāma]] instead for the increase of power.
